Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Aerotaur::
       He nodded and gestured for Axis to follow him.  Once they were out of 
hearing range of all of the other bots he began to whisper.  "I need you to 
follow them.  But stay out of sight.  Something just doesn't feel right about 
them.  And I want you to keep an eye on Nightlight.  Make sure they don't do 
anything to her.  Thank you."

--part1_60.16d1a0f6.29258aa2_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>::Aerotaur::
<BR>       He nodded and gestured for Axis to follow him.  Once they were out of hearing range of all of the other bots he began to whisper.  "I need you to follow them.  But stay out of sight.  Something just doesn't feel right about them.  And I want you to keep an eye on Nightlight.  Make sure they don't do anything to her.  Thank you."</FONT></HTML>

--part1_60.16d1a0f6.29258aa2_boundary--
